Property Reference: 1761719. Stunning Detached House with Spacious Garden and Modern Features Welcome to this exceptional detached house, a true gem that offers a perfect forever home for families. Located in the prestigious Friern Barnet Lane, this property combines elegance, convenience, and a host of modern features to enhance your lifestyle. As you approach, you'll be greeted by a spacious driveway capable of accommodating up to five cars, providing ample parking space for you and your guests. The property boasts a secure gated entrance, ensuring privacy and peace of mind. Additionally, the presence of a comprehensive CCTV system and an alarm system adds an extra layer of security to this remarkable home. Step inside, and you'll be immediately impressed by the stylish interior and spacious layout. The property features five generously sized bedrooms and four well-appointed bathrooms, providing ample space for the entire family to relax and unwind. With an abundance of natural light, these rooms create a warm and inviting atmosphere that will make you feel right at home. One of the standout features of this property is the large rear garden, a true oasis for outdoor enthusiasts. With a well-maintained lawn, it offers plenty of space for children to play, hosting family gatherings, or simply enjoying some peaceful moments. The patio area provides an ideal spot for al fresco dining, entertaining guests, or simply unwinding after a long day. For those who value education, the renowned Dwight School London is conveniently within walking distance, ensuring a quality educational experience for your children. Additionally, the nearby Friary Park offers a picturesque setting for leisurely walks, picnics, and outdoor activities, allowing you to enjoy nature at its best. Other notable features of this exceptional property include a garage for secure parking and storage, as well as a dedicated study area, perfect for remote work or a quiet space for personal pursuits. Property Reference: 1761717. A one bedroom, modern ground floor maisonette with garden, private parking and entrance available from late September. The Area The property is located on a quiet row of houses, but is close to a bus stop and just 5 minutes from Anerley Station & 10 minutes from Crystal Palace Station (lines to Victoria & London Bridge Stations, as well as the Overground).  There is a great pub up the road (Douglas Fir), cafes, beer & wine shops, Bakehouse and Co-op 2 minutes away.  The historic Crystal Palace park is just a five minute walk, with an array of entertaining features such as pedalo boats, Sunday market and playgrounds. The Dinosaurs are incredible!  The Property The property makes for the perfect home for someone on their own or a couple.  The shower room has been recently renovated, with an electric shower.  There is a lovely open flat living area with space to have a dining table and chairs and a sofa. The kitchen benefits from ample storage and cupboard space, fridge/freezer and a washing machine. The garden is easy to maintain with artificial grass, a great space to use in the Summer months.  There is a coat cupboard and two indoor cupboards for plenty of storage. Address: Uncle Stockwell, 60 Courland Grove, London, SW8
Description: New to the market after its UNCLE makeover, this spacious and stylish studio flat is situated in a highly sought-after development in Zone 2 of London overlooking Larkhall Park. UNCLE Stockwell is located within a 10-minute walk of Stockwell tube station on the Northern and Victoria lines, offering fantastic connections to Victoria, Euston and London Bridge and Wandsworth Road overground station for direct connections to Clapham, Canada Water and Denmark Hill for Kings College Hospital.    At UNCLE, we never expect our residents to settle for second best, so our revitalised studios now come with brand new Bo Concept furniture, newly installed top spec kitchen appliances, updated ensuite bathrooms with new showers, and great storage solutions to help you maximise space.  As well as its amazing studio apartments, UNCLE Stockwell has friendly and helpful on-site Resident Managers that live on the property. They are there to help ensure your home is the amazing place it should be - including sorting any maintenance and looking after your parcel deliveries.  All residents have access to the free on-site Peloton studio, gym (which has also been expanded as part of the makeover), coworking space with private work pods, resident's lounge and communal courtyard.  In a nutshell, you're looking at a beautiful, revamped studio apartment with designer furniture in Zone 2 with amazing access to central London and a gym, Peloton studio, coworking space, plus wonderful on-site Resident Managers and the amazing UNCLE community. And at a great price. What's not to love?  A great location as part of the triangle with Brixton and Vauxhall known as 'Little Portugal', which is the hub for amazing Portuguese restaurants, cafes and bakeries that London has to offer.  A thriving local community providing a wide selection of local shops, restaurants and local amenities with the buzz of Brixton and Clapham's boutiques, shops, bars, restaurants and amazing parks (including Clapham Common and Battersea Park) within walking distance. Not only this, but you're only a short walk from the Thames, and from the Victoria and Northern lines, as well as the overground, so getting into Central London is a cinch. Read more

Description:
Introducing a breathtaking house in a prestigious development of four newly constructed townhouses, nestled within a secure and gated community. This stunning property offers modern architecture and spacious living spaces, designed to perfection. With allocated parking and a private courtyard, this residence exudes luxury and exclusivity.
   Step inside the impressive entrance hall, which sets the tone for the contemporary elegance found throughout the house. The double reception room provides a versatile space for relaxation and entertainment, while the open plan dining room and kitchen create a seamless flow for social gatherings and culinary delights. The kitchen boasts high-end appliances and sleek finishes, making it a chef's dream.
   The house comprises three double bedrooms, each offering a haven of comfort and style. Two of the bedrooms feature en-suite facilities, providing convenience and privacy. Additionally, there is a further shower room and a guest cloakroom, ensuring ample amenities for residents and guests.
   Conveniently situated near the vibrant shops and restaurants of the local area, including the renowned Regent's Park Road, you'll enjoy a plethora of dining and shopping options at your doorstep. Just moments away, Primrose Hill Park awaits, offering a serene escape and breathtaking views. For seamless travel connections, Chalk Farm Underground station (Northern Line) is a short stroll away, allowing easy access to the wider city.
   This exceptional house is a true gem, offering contemporary design, spacious living areas, and a sought-after location. Whether you're seeking a tranquil retreat or a vibrant urban lifestyle, this property caters to your every desire. Don't miss the opportunity to make this extraordinary residence your own.

Description: A fabulous dual-aspect and luxurious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment is available for letting from the 1/8/23. Located in the iconic Southbank Tower, this outstanding apartment is furnished. It encompasses a fully fitted impressive kitchen, with an open plan reception room designed to entertain with impressive dual north-to-north-west facing river views of Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament. The London Eye and other famous London landmarks. The reception is bathed in natural light that pours in through the floor-to-ceiling windows throughout the apartment and measures 911 sq ft.  Southbank Tower is a confident, soaring design that is a distinctive landmark on London cultural mile, and residents benefit from high-speed lift access, an indoor swimming pool, and a fully fitted gym for residents. With breathtaking views of London is a state-of-the-art Residents Business centre, Residents Entertaining Lounge, Communal Roof garden, and Cinema Room.  The building is based between The Royal Festival Hall and Shakespeares Globe and adjacent to the iconic Sea Containers House, home to the Mondrian Hotel.  With Southwark and Blackfriars Underground stations, a short distance away it allows quick access to Central London as well as connecting train stations to the airports and other parts of England. Excellent transport links and shops and amenities are nearby and the tower is located close to parks, garden squares, the river, hospitals, and The Houses of Parliament.  Located on the South Bank you are just a short distance to the theatres, restaurants, and attractions of Covent Garden, the trendy upbeat Soho, the shopping of Oxford Street, and the green spaces and famous historical squares that London has to offer.   Transport links on your doorstep include; Southwark (0.4 miles), Blackfriars (0.4 miles) and Temple (0.7 miles) underground stations, Waterloo East (0.5 miles) for national rail, and the new City Thameslink (0.6 miles). Read more

   The Lark is perfectly located for enjoying all that Nine elms & Battersea has to offer. From the green spaces on your doorstep, to the variety of amazing bars and restaurants within a short walk, not to mention the 5 minute walk to the Battersea Power Station underground station.
   The Lark boasts luxury accommodation with high specification interiors across a range of prices and layouts to suit your style of living. Live in comfort with the wirelessly controlled heating and cooling, experience unrivalled light & views through the floor-to-ceiling windows, enjoy the ample storage with our fitted wardrobes and relax on a summers evening on the private balconies with outdoor furniture provided.
   Experience exceptional on-site amenities including a virtual workout studio, intimate cinema room, stylish resident's lounge and co-working space, private meeting rooms and a large private podium garden. The Lark Residents will also benefit from our 24 hour concierge, use of sophisticated resident app & superfast fibre broadband. Pets are welcome too!
   EPC available. Council Tax Band E. Living Area Open – plan living area, luxury amtico flooring throughout and fitted curtains. Fully fitted kitchen, integrated appliances, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, oven, hob and extractor fan. Bedroom Built-in Wardrobe, plush carpets and fitted curtains. Bathroom Fully tiled bathroom with full size bath, overhead shower and heated towel rail and underfloor heating. Read more

Address: Singer Mews, Clapham Road London SW4
Description: A well presented, exceptionally bright two bedroom apartment with a private roof terrace set in a popular gated development between Clapham North and Stockwell tube stations. This stunning apartment offers a open plan kitchen reception, two double bedrooms with the master offering fitted wardrobes and a modern bathroom suite. The property further benefits from bike storage, two secure gated entrances and lift access. The Singer Mews development is well located for all of the amenities of Clapham North, Brixton and Clapham High Street, as well as the added bonus of the nearby Victoria Underground station of Stockwell and the Northern line of Clapham North. London Overground Services is also a option with Clapham High Street being a very short distance away. Holding Deposit: £600 (1 week)* Tenancy Deposit: £3,000 (5 weeks)* Council Tax Band: D *The deposit amounts are approximate and will vary depending on the final rent agreed. Read more

Large Upper Ground Floor, One Double Bedroom Flat in a period building, positioned on Oakley Square NW1, within a short walk to Mornington Crescent Tube Station and the centre of Camden Town.
   Comprising of a spacious lounge to the front of the property, overlooking Oakley Square Gardens through large picture windows. A large double bedroom to the rear of the property with built in wardrobes and furnishings, a fully fitted kitchen with appliances which include a fridge freezer and a washer/dryer. The bathroom is part tiled with a bath, wash basin, WC and a walk in shower cubicle.
   Additional features include laminate wooden flooring throughout, gas central heating, neutral décor, high ceilings and secure entry intercom system.
   Available from 11th August 2023
   For more information and to arrange an appointment to view this property, please contact our lettings team, who will be happy to help.

Property Reference: 1739781. * GYM * 24 HOUR CONCIERGE * COMMUNAL GARDENS * CO-WORKING SPACES * SECURE CYCLE STORE * RESIDENTS FUNCTION/CINEMA ROOM * SUITABLE FOR PROFESSIONAL OR STUDENT SHARERS * Furnished and ready to move in to, a large (847Ft2) bright and airy 2 bed, 2 bathroom interior designed 12th floor apartment within Hurlock Heights. Situated in Zone 1, within the sustainable community of Elephant Park SE17.  The living space is dual aspect, with full height windows, wooden flooring and has a heating/cooling system. The bespoke modern fitted kitchen has integrated Bosch appliances and a sunny south west facing private balcony. 5G Broadband is available. There are 2 large double bedroom with contemporary bathroom ensuites, with spacious fitted wardrobes in the master bedroom.  Well served by local shops, bars, cafés, and restaurants, the development has excellent Underground (Bakerloo & Northern lines), train (Thameslink & Southeastern) and bus (15 routes) services, providing easy access to the City, West End and beyond. The property is also on the London Cycle Superhighway 6, and close to St Thomas', Guy's and King's Hospitals. Viewings and virtual tours available. Property Reference: 1761647. A very spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 1100 sqft flat with Thames river views in a sought after development on the Isle of Dogs. The property boasts a large kitchen with a peninsula breakfast bar and an open plan living and dining area.  The living area has sliding doors opening onto a large balcony with spectacular views and sunsets across the river and towards Central London.  There are also views towards the Canary Wharf skyline. Very modern kitchen with dishwasher, ample storage, large drawers and breakfast bar. The master bedroom is very spacious and has a built-in wardrobe and it's own ensuite bathroom. The second bedroom is also spacious with a built-in wardrobe. There is ample storage in the hallway with a large built-in storage cupboard. The flat has access to the on-site gym which has a large variety of exercise machines and equipment and the development benefits from a 24 hour concierge. High speed fibre internet available. Underground secure parking space available. Large communal garden area accessible to residents. Approx 1100 sqft!! Millwall Park, Mudchute Park and City Farm and Greenwich Park are all a short walk away.  There is an Asda Superstore less than 1km away and plenty of shops and restaurants at Canary Wharf. An impressive two bedroom two bathroom loft style duplex apartment available for long let, located in the heart of the Shoreditch Triangle.
   Newly refurbished. Available immediately from July.
   This spacious and light apartment with westerly aspect has been recently renovated and is situated on the third and fourth floors. Near 900 sqft. The third floor double height reception room, flooded with light from a fully glazed wall with electric blinds, has an appealing and well appointed open-plan L shaped kitchen, with integrated appliances (including SMEG refrigerator), dining area and west-facing Juliet balcony. This opens onto a quiet mews cul-de-sac and has views over the lower Victorian warehouse buildings opposite.
  
 An open tread stair leads to a mezzanine bedroom, separate bathroom and master bedroom with ensuite shower. Both bedrooms are sizeable, with westerly views and fitted storage, whilst both bathrooms have contemporary décor and walk-in showers, there is a projector and screen for movie nights in one of the bedrooms too. The apartment also benefits from air-conditioning on both floors and Nest heating, both are linked with 'smart control'.
   City Plaza is on Curtain Road in a central Shoreditch location, within walking distance of the City and neighbourhood attractions such as Brick Lane, Hoxton Square and Spitalfields Market, and close to the train stations (Undergound, Overground, main line) at Liverpool and Old Street.
   Available in May 2023 Read more

A bright and light one double bedroom apartment available for long let, ideally located within this popular residential scheme of 18 units in the heart of Bethnal Green, E2.
   Housed on the third floor of this gated development, the property benefits from an open-plan kitchen and reception space, separate master bedroom and tiled bathroom with shower cubicle. Residents at Mowlem Street have access to a communal decked patio garden, lift access and the building is double glazed throughout. The flat also benefits from secure entry phone, high ceilings and wooden floors. It is only minutes from Cambridge Heath station.
   The property will be given a comprehensive deep clean prior to tenancy commencement. Available from 19th August 2023. Offered part furnished. Read more

Property Reference: 1752282. A fantastic place to live in. Ideal for a couple, two professionals sharing or a single occupant needing an office at home or a guestroom. This 2nd floor flat has been recently rebuilt to the highest standards. It sits in a very well maintained Victorian terrace built in 1885, renovated in 2022. It comprises 1 large double bedroom and one single bedroom, 1 bathroom, open-space kitchen/living room. Wooden floors throughout, modern appliances, large amount of storage (including eaves storage for luggage). Energy efficient, warm in winter and cool in summer. Sash windows with special double-glazed acoustic glass. Great view over the quiet and relaxing Royal Brompton Cemetery, which is the nearest park. Very bright and well ventilated. Quiet neighbours. Gas hobs, roof window, oven and microwave, memory foam mattresses, large no-frost fridge/freezer, new washer/dryer, video doorbell. Excellent safety measures/devices. Comes fully furnished, including kitchenware and small appliances, deep-cleaned and ready to move in with minimal luggage.  Earl's Court is a strategic location for people often on the move or willing to enjoy London: Overground, District and Piccadilly lines are at a 5 min walk. Victoria coach station is less than 30 mins by public transport. Heathrow and Gatwick are reached in less than 1 hour, The City in 35 mins. You will be eligible for the RBKC parking permit (~150£/year), which allows you to park anywhere in Kensington & Chelsea. Easy access to M4 and M40. Plenty of bus routes and taxis. Hyde Park and Holland Park are at a 20 min walk.    All bills/utilities and/or regular cleaning services can be included optionally. Local landlord, no agents involved; OpenRent will be the platform to run the tenancy swiftly and transparently.  Please inquire regarding short lettings. Property Reference: 1714294. Large double room with ensuite available from 5 August. A modernised apartment located conveniently on the Green Lanes High Street. Recently refurbished to a high standard, the kitchen is equipped with built-in appliances including electric hob, oven, extractor hood and washing machine, and large American-style fridge freezer. There is ample storage throughout and has a shared dining area. Rooms are furnished with new ottoman beds (storage underneath), wardrobes, a desk and chair. Own private ensuite shower with basin and toilet. The apartment is in walking distance to local independent shops, bustling cafes, a large Sainsbury's and Waitrose supermarkets. Regular bus routes to access North London and beyond, only a short 10 minutes' walk to Winchmore Hill railway station. Commute to major stations including Finsbury Park, Highbury & Islington, Old Street and Moorgate all within 30 minutes. Rent includes broadband, water and council tax. Electricity is metered separately and tenants pay for own personal use. The property comprises of two double bedrooms, large eat-in kitchen/open plan reception, family bathroom and parking drive for one car. The property has recently been refurbished and is offered unfurnished and available now Fairmile Avenue in SW16 is well-connected by public transport, with several bus routes and train stations nearby. Bus routes that serve Fairmile Avenue include the 60, 166, 255, 315, 319, 417, and 432. These bus routes connect the area to nearby towns and cities, including Croydon, Streatham, and Tooting. Nearest train stations to Fairmile Avenue are Streatham Common and Norbury, both of which are around a 10-minute walk away. These stations provide access to London Victoria, London Bridge, and other destinations in South London and beyond. In addition, there are several cycle routes in the area, including the National Cycle Network Route 23, which runs through Streatham Common. There are also several car parks and on-street parking options available in the area. Please note the household income will need to be 2.5 x the annual rent. Regent are proud to present this airy two-bedroom apartment in the heart of Phoenix Court building, as a part of Oval Village development, SE11.   The property comprises two spacious bedrooms, an open-concept living area with a large, fully fitted kitchen, a well-equipped bathroom and a balcony.   Residents will further benefit from access to amenities such as 24h concierge service, a security system, a well-equipped gym, a swimming pool, a residents' lounge and a lobby.   The development is situated in the heart of London. Victoria Line from Vauxhall station is situated just a five-minute walk from the development. Less than 10 minutes and you are in the city centre. If you want to get to Gatwick airport, it will take only 30 minutes.   Oval Village is the perfect base to explore the city. Enjoy the culinary delights of Soho and Covent Garden, boutiques along the King's Road and excursions to the National Theatre.   Oval Village is situated just a five-minute walk from Kennington Park, with an array of leisure facilities along with its open grassland and flower gardens. Other exciting green gems, such as the captivating bohemian Bonnington Square Garden and Vauxhall City Farm, offer all the sights and sounds of nature to exemplify Europe's greenest city. Regent are proud to present this beautiful two-bedroom apartment in Meranti House, part of the iconic Goodman's Fields development, E1. The apartment comprises two double bedrooms, two luxurious bathrooms (1 en-suite), a light and airy lounge space leading onto a private terrace, high specification fully fitted open plan kitchen with integrated appliances, and two NE facing balconies. Further benefits include wooden flooring throughout the halls and lounge, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, and built-in wardrobes in both bedrooms. The residents will also benefit from access to the on-site gymnasium, swimming pool, spa, plus 24-hour concierge, a business lounge, and a private cinema room. Goodman's Fields is strategically positioned in a metropolitan area of London that provides all these attractions, many on your doorstep. Explore a side of life where the world's greatest Michelin starred restaurants, gastronomic pubs and cultural, artistic, and historic landmarks are set to provide a host of wonderful and unforgettable experiences. With its' excellent transport links from Aldgate/Aldgate East underground, DLR from Tower Gateway, and River Bus from Tower Millennium Pier you will be in the rest of the city in no time. Two bedroom first floor flat with two double bedrooms near Catford stations. This two bedroom split level flat is just a stones throw from the Catford stations. The property is currently been refurbished hence no images at present The property consists of a reception, a kitchen, two double bedrooms and a bathroom We do not have floorplan or photos as the property is currently being decorated. Viewings will take place this Friday only. You can book online at our website   The property is available unfurnished. The annual household income will need to be 2.5 x the annual rent 1. Train: - Catford and Catford Bridge railway stations are both located in the area. They are served by Southeastern trains, providing services to various destinations including London Bridge, Charing Cross, Cannon Street, and Victoria. - These train services offer convenient access to central London and other parts of the city. 2. Bus: - Catford has excellent bus connectivity, with several bus routes serving the area. - The major bus routes include 47 (to Shoreditch), 54 (to Woolwich), 136 (to Elephant and Castle), 171 (to Elephant and Castle), 185 (to Victoria), 199 (to Canada Water), 208 (to Lewisham), 320 (to Biggin Hill), and N171 (night bus to Tottenham Court Road). 3. Tram: - The nearest tram stop to Catford is Beckenham Hill, which is a short distance away. From there, you can take Tramlink services to destinations including Croydon, Wimbledon, and New Addington. 4. Cycling and Walking: - Catford is also well-served by cycling and walking routes, allowing residents to easily access nearby areas. - The area has dedicated cycle lanes and footpaths, making it convenient for pedestrians and cyclists to commute or explore the surroundings. 5. Road: - Catford is located near the A205 South Circular Road, which provides easy access to various parts of South London. - The A21 road passes through Catford, connecting the area to destinations like Lewisham, Bromley, and Hastings. Overall, Catford offers a good range of transport links, including train services, buses, trams, cycling and walking routes, and road connections. These links make it relatively easy for residents and visitors to travel to and from Catford and explore different parts of London and beyond. Property Reference: 1761607. Recently renovated two bedroom flat with its own entrance and private garden, located on a quiet street within the conservation area. Description: Property Reference: 1761061. Furnished 2-bed, 2-bath flat including parking space. Superbly located for tube and city on fashionable Bermondsey Street, discover the epitome of city living in this fully furnished, modern and bright apartment. Situated on one of the most sought-after streets in London Bridge, this stunning 2-Double Bedroom, 2-Bathroom first floor apartment is set within a secure gated private development backing onto the new Bermondsey Square with its restaurants, art-house cinema, farmers market and supermarket.       Key Features:   ·       Allocated car parking space    ·       Two double bedrooms with new wood effect flooring, ample fitted wardrobes and ceiling fans   ·       Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and charming garden views   ·       Second bedroom facing the peaceful communal gardens   ·       Two contemporary bathrooms, one with a bath and the other with a shower   ·       Generously sized reception and dining area with wood flooring and large triple glazed windows providing abundant natural light   ·       Fully-fitted modern separate kitchen with dishwasher, washing machine, and convection oven   ·       New 50-inch flat screen TV on a swivel wall mount   ·       Secure gated development    ·       Alarm and video entry system for added security       Location:   Nestled within a private development, this apartment backs onto the vibrant Bermondsey Square, offering an array of amenities right at your doorstep. Explore an eclectic selection of restaurants, indulge in art-house cinema screenings, and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of the farmers market and supermarket. The world-renowned Bermondsey Antiques Market is also just moments away. Experience the culinary delights of Borough Food Market, all within easy walking distance. Additionally, the apartment is only seconds away from the convenience of the local Sainsbury's supermarket.       Transportation:   Benefit from excellent transport links with bus stops directly outside the apartment, providing easy access to the City in just 10 minutes and the West End in 25 minutes. London Bridge Station, Borough Station, and Tower Hill Station are all within walking distance, connecting you to various underground lines and rail services.       Perfect for:   This apartment is ideal for city workers and couples seeking a comfortable and stylish home in the heart of central London.       Contact us now to arrange a viewing and secure your chance to experience the best of Bermondsey Street living. Pimlico Underground station is within 7 mins of the apartment, providing direct Victoria line links into the City and beyond. That moment when you have your heart set on your dream property only to be told it has been let! London rental market is not just one of the most competitive markets in the world but fastmoving, with multiple tenants in a race to get the top properties. On many occasions up to 15 applicants for a single open house viewing. Here at Residential Realtors we have listened to your feedback and are proud to be the first London agent to offer the opportunity to make a Pre Viewing Reservation (PVR) What is a Pre Viewing Reservation (PVR)? If all tenants are unable to view the property immediately. Reserve the property before your scheduled viewing time, by placing a PVR offer you will have the comfort of knowing that the property is reserved for you until your scheduled viewing slot. How can a make a PVR offer? 1. Complete our Previewing Reservation Form (Esign Application available on request) 2. Pay a one weeks rent holding deposit. 3. Arrange the appointment to view the property or organise a Facetime, Skype or Whatsapp Video Tour. 4. If the property does not live up to your expectation after your viewing, a refund will be issued within 24 hours of your request. 5. If you decide to proceed with a formal offer, the holding deposit will be used towards the initial payment of your first months rent. Struggling to find time to go on rental viewings? Facetime, Skype or Whatsapp Video tours now available, ask your agent for further details on   Up to 20% of Residential Realtors viewings since January 2019 were carried out remotely. Majority of customers signed on the dotted line without ever seeing the homes in person. Overseas customers, graduates and young professionals as well as timepoor Londoners are leading the way. A beautifully modern one-bedroom apartment in this residential development of Beaufort Park, Colindale, NW9. 
   This spacious home has a light, palette, creating the perfect space to unwind at the end of a busy day. The open-plan kitchen and living space lead to a private balcony. The fully-fitted kitchen has integrated appliances and enjoys plenty of room.
   Meanwhile, the carpeted bedroom is spacious with floor-to-ceiling windows, integrated wardrobes and excellent fixtures. The bathroom is well rendered, featuring an overhead shower, vanity unit and a classic tiled finish. 
   Designed by the award-winning developer St George, Beaufort Park is an amazing combination of open green spaces, tree-lined boulevards and five-star facilities, keeping its residents healthy and active all year round. It's situated in Colindale, a quiet, leafy borough only moments from Barnet, a lively part of town featuring everything from adventure golf to great cinema and theatre venues. 
   Both neighbourhoods are home to an array of high-end pubs, cafes and shops, making this a highly sought-after part of the capital. For many, though, the biggest draw is the abundance of parks and woodland. There's even a local lake, making Beaufort Park the perfect place to spend time getting back to nature.
   Residents at Beaufort Park have access to an incredible 25 acres of parkland just as part of the development itself, plus the use of a pool, spa and private gym. There's also a sauna, onsite cafes and restaurants and 24hr concierge service, there to ensure you get the absolute most from your living experience. Transport links are all excellent, making travel into London and beyond quick and easy. The emphasis at Beaufort Park has always been on creating a real haven, somewhere to relax, thrive and really live life to the full. 
   A walk-through video tour will be available soon but in the meantime, we would love to show you around in person so make sure you contact us to book a viewing. If you have any questions about this property, please do not hesitate to call us. Read more

Features Excellent Condition  Quiet location Excellent transport links 2 Bedrooms Property description A beautifully presented mid-terrace house set in a popular and quiet modern development.  This spacious two bedroom house, opens into a large entrance hall, perfect for coats and storage. The ground floor consists of a separate kitchen and a spacious open plan living/ dining room which opens on to a good sized, mature private garden with a shed. The living space is bright and has plenty of space for a busy family. The kitchen has all modern appliances and is designed to maximise the space. Upstairs there are two double bedrooms with plenty of built in wardrobes and storage. The main bathroom is between the two bedrooms. The house is double glazed throughout and there is off-street parking on the driveway immediately in front of the house. There are also two bike racks out the front. Pets are allowed but cats only, sorry. There is a cat flap in the back garden door ready for use. Shaw Road is a short walk to both East Dulwich station and Denmark Hill with regular trains to London Bridge, Victoria, Canada Water, Highbury and Islington and Whitechapel. There are also excellent bus links to central and wider London. Lordship Lane, Bellenden Road and Peckham Rye are all within walking distance with a great range of  amenities, leisure and culture including access to green spaces such as Dulwich Park, Peckham Rye and Ruskin Park – all a short walk or drive away. A large Sainsburys is a 5 minute walk away. There are also a number of very good schools/nurseries nearby. This property is perfect for a small family or a couple looking for a house rather than a flat in a great location. Property will be unfurnished. Viewing highly recommended. Property Reference: 1614365. Fab two double bed first floor Victorian Conversion flat on quiet road; ten-minute walk to North or East Dulwich Stations and a huge Sainsburys.  Large living/dining room with views over Jags Playing fields and London skyline. Part furnished.     Available from 1st August 2023 , this spacious and light upper floor Victorian conversion flat benefits from large windows and high ceilings, 2 bedrooms and a large bathroom with ample storage. The flat comes part-furnished; perfect for a professional couple, or friends sharing.   Situated opposite the Alleyn’s school playing fields on the quiet tree-lined Townley Road, the flat is positioned perfectly in between the lively Lordship Lane, Dulwich Village, Dulwich Park, as well as North Dulwich and East Dulwich Stations; all about 10 minutes away by foot.    The two spacious double bedrooms have expansive windows and the rear bedroom has large fitted wardrobes and space for a desk.   The bathroom has a shower over the bathtub, and two very large and stylish fitted wardrobes providing ample storage.    The fitted kitchen contains a washing machine, microwave, tall 50/50 fridge freezer, and oven with hob, alongside sweeping counters and under and overhead cupboards.   It is minutes walk from East Dulwich Picture House, Marks & Spencer Local, the Co-op, Rose's Butchers, Moxen's Fishmongers, Mons Cheeseshop, Franklin's Delicatessen plus North Cross Road Market.    It’s ten minutes walk to East Dulwich station (London Bridge or Victoria 12 minutes).   East Dulwich has some of the best neighbourhood restaurants and bars in South London including the Gowlett, the Great Exhibition, The Montpelier, The East Dulwich Tavern plus Yama Momo, The Palmerston, Franklins and The Thai Corner Café.    Add in the amenities of Peckham - its bars and clubs, its cinema and The Bussey Building are also within short walking distance.   Dulwich Park and Peckham Rye are also short walks away with swimming pools at East Dulwich leisure centre and Jags Sportsclub and Hot Yoga in Peckham.   It's perfect for a professional sharers or a couple who want the best East Dulwich has to offer right on their doorstep commuting to the City or the West End.         Summary & Exclusions: - Rent Amount: £1,700.00 per month (£392.31 per week) - Deposit / Bond: £1,900.00 - 2 Bedrooms - 1 Bathrooms - Property comes furnished or unfurnished (tenant can decide) - Available to move in from 01 August, 2023 - Minimum tenancy term is 12 months - Maximum number of tenants is 2 - No Students - No Pets, sorry - No Smokers - Not Suitable for Families / Children - Bills not included - No Parking Available - No Garden Access - EPC Rating: D    If calling, please quote reference: 1614365    Fees: You will  not  be charged any admin fees.  ** Contact today to book a viewing and have the landlord show you round! **  Request Details form responded to 24/7, with phone bookings available 9am-9pm, 7 days a week. Address: Hanover House, 7 St. George Wharf, Vauxhall, London, SW8
Description: Available late August! is this 1 bedroom property in the St George Wharf Development. This well presented apartment in Hanover House, includes a bright and spacious reception and generously-sized double bedroom, providing a fantastic amount of storage space. This property is fully furnished to a good standard and is available immediately for viewing.  Within the development, you have pretty much everything you need, no need to google your local amenities around where you live. You have everything on-site, including dry cleaners, 24-hour commercial gym, hair salon, coffee shop, Italian cafe, yoga/ pilates studio after your meal at the Italian cafe, grocery shop, medical centre, dental spa, nail salon, LiFE can't get any more convenient.  That's not all, there is also a selection of riverside restaurants & bars and even the clipper boat service at your doorstep! Did I mention you also have access to your 24 Hour Concierge Service? Definitely, have to subscribe to Amazon Prime membership to benefit the full experience.   Having grocery shops nearby is essential because sometimes you just can't decide what to eat from the choice of roughly 82 restaurants on the Deliveroo takeaway platform. If the on-site Tesco's or the Flagship Sainsbury's store which is about 5 minutes walk away is not enough for you, I highly recommend you head down to the New Covent Garden Market. Home to approximately 200 fruits and the largest wholesale fruit, vegetable and flower market in the UK! Vauxhall Park is just adjacent to the development. When the weather's good, why not stop by on your way home and snack through all the goodies you just bought.   Travelling across London is a breeze, with Vauxhall station located literally next to the development and the London bus station just across the road. That is what I call "rain-free access". Vauxhall boasts some of the best transport links in the capital, with the Victoria underground line providing easy access to get into central and the West End. Vauxhall station provides direct links to London's most important mainline stations, Victoria, Euston, Kings Cross and St Pancras International. If your university or work is in the city, you might as well just take a Viavan carpool. Still, need parking? Not an issue. Parking can also be provided with this property via separate negotiation.   Call now or just pop into our branch and one of our Letting's Negotiators can book you in for a viewing ASAP! Read more

Address: The Printworks, 139 Clapham Road, Stockwell, London, SW9
Description: A masterful collection of fully furnished studio apartments, The Printworks sits within a unique conservation area surrounded by opulent tree lined Georgian terraces and Regency villas. Each highly specified apartment is finished and equipped for luxurious living. The living areas will benefit from extensive natural light with the majority featuring distinctive, classically styled arched windows.  Located on an upper floor, offered in a pristine condition with ample storage available to help enjoy the studio space to its full capacity. This apartment further features a high spec bathroom and a fully integrated kitchen that makes cooking a dream and the washing up is even easier with the inclusion of a dishwasher. The entire development is set around beautiful landscaped gardens. Residents enjoy private parking (at an additional cost), secure bicycle storage and charming communal grounds. With an attentive concierge team, gym facilities, café and a supermarket next-door- what more could you ask for?  It's only a stone's throw from Stockwell tube station, which gives you quick access to the city! Sound Good? Don't Miss out and give us a call for a private viewing!!! Read more

Description: A bright and exceptionally spacious three bedroom, two bathroom (1162 square feet) apartment on the second and third floor in a period conversion on Beaufort Street, Chelsea.  This apartment has a fantastically sized reception room, that connects seamlessly to the separate dining room and kitchen. The reception room further benefits from a feature fire place, flat screen television and dividing double doors that can close off the dining room/kitchen completely at one's choice. This provides really good practical flexibility with entertaining or instead when there is a need for isolation or privacy. The kitchen is integrated throughout and provides: electric cooker/oven, washer and dryer combination, dishwasher and a tall fridge/fridge freezer.  The third bedroom is perhaps best utilised as an office or a younger persons bedroom. This bedroom contains a wardrobe and drawer unit. The second double bedroom benefits from wall-to-wall built in wardrobes and alongside the third bedroom will benefit from the usage of the external bathroom which provides a freestanding shower, wash basin and WC.  The master bedroom is large throughout and provides built in closets, a drawer unit and an en-suite bathroom (providing: bath-tub with stand up shower combination, wash basin and WC).  It cannot be forgotten that this apartment provides access to a wonderful patio terrace that over hangs the neighbours' gardens below and provides for peaceful and relaxing views.  Finally, this apartment benefits from wooden floors throughout, gas heating, and secure door entry phone. Portlands Place is the newest addition to E20’s thriving community that takes living to another level. With a completely unique double-weighted Skybridge on the 10th floor, state-of-the-art amenities and roof terraces, Portlands Place offers the ultimate indoor/outdoor living experience. Residents can enjoy views across the Wetlands, 25 acres of green open space, the Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park and out towards the city skyline.  The Skybridge serves as a truly inspirational co-working space, exclusively for residents, and has separate zones for relaxing and entertaining with its own wine dispenser. Here you’ll also find a meditation room, a fitness suite complete with a spin studio, as well as a screening room. Plus a fully-equipped bookable kitchen with dining room seating for 25 people and direct access to the roof terrace, the perfect spot for hosting celebrations or simply connecting with neighbours. All of this is within five minutes’ walk of Stratford International Station and Westfield Shopping Centre. This fully furnished two double bedroom, two bathroom home, is located on the 13th floor of Skylark Point and is part of our ‘Signature’ collection scheme. This timeless Nordic-inspired interior brings a calm but invigorating palette of natural materials into your home. Oak finished coffee tables and sideboards are complemented with earthy tones – pine greens and burnt orange accents – for an organic look and feel. All homes also feature desks and functional desk chairs for a comfortable home working set-up.  The open plan kitchen and living area features dual aspect floor to ceiling windows, maximising natural light and offering incomparable views. With an ensuite shower room and a family bathroom, this home also features a spacious fitted wardrobe in all bedrooms, wooden floors throughout and other home tech includes keyless entry and hyperfast Hyperoptic WiFi. When you choose Get Living, you’re renting more than a home. Our neighbourhoods are ever-growing hubs, designed to make living in your favourite city easy; offering 24/7 security, bike storage, private resident gardens and post rooms to supermarkets, gyms, free events and more. East Village is located in the perfect corner of East London, set in 67 acres of parkland – perfect for those wanting to balance an active lifestyle with quiet, village living. Stratford’s Zone 2 connectivity is unmatched with access to Underground, Overground and National Rail services. About the Building Sip coffee on Makefield Road. Or pints in grain-to-can breweries. Walk along the buzzing High Road or follow trails across wild marshes. Hop on a train and you’ll be in central London in 15. You’re spoiled for transport connections. Within a three-minute walk of the front door, reach Tottenham Hale railway station, underground (Victoria line) and bus stops along Watermead Way.
   The Gessner is a building that offers considered design to set the scene for your home. From the rooftop gardens with views of the city to curated art-lined walls that make a statement. There’s space to meet neighbours over a drink, or settle in for dinner and a movie at yours.
   The Location
   The Gessner overlooks the stunning Walthamstow Wetlands, a nature reserve covering a vast area of Thames Water reservoir as well as the open green space of Down Lane Park. There is access to miles of open space with Lee Valley on the doorstep. Walk or even cycle down the River Lea and canals all the way past Stoke Newington and Shoreditch up to the financial district of the city. There are also some superb cafes, restaurants and bars in close proximity as well as being conveniently close to a retail park and large supermarkets.
   Public Transport
   Situated moments away from Tottenham Hale Station (Underground Victoria Line Zone 3) with its additional Stansted Express Link and bus routes. The direct tube and rail links get you to King’s Cross in only 12 minutes, West End in 15 minutes and Liverpool Street in 20 minutes, as well as bus routes direct into Central London.

That moment when you have your heart set on your dream property only to be told it has been let! London rental market is not just one of the most competitive markets in the world but fastmoving, with multiple tenants in a race to get the top properties. On many occasions up to 15 applicants for a single open house viewing. Here at Residential Realtors we have listened to your feedback and are proud to be the first London agent to offer the opportunity to make a Pre Viewing Reservation (PVR) What is a Pre Viewing Reservation (PVR)? If all tenants are unable to view the property immediately. Reserve the property before your scheduled viewing time, by placing a PVR offer you will have the comfort of knowing that the property is reserved for you until your scheduled viewing slot. How can a make a PVR offer? 1. Complete our Previewing Reservation Form (Esign Application available on request) 2. Pay a one weeks rent holding deposit. 3. Arrange the appointment to view the property or organise a Facetime, Skype or Whatsapp Video Tour. 4. If the property does not live up to your expectation after your viewing, a refund will be issued within 24 hours of your request. 5. If you decide to proceed with a formal offer, the holding deposit will be used towards the initial payment of your first months rent. Struggling to find time to go on rental viewings? Facetime, Skype or Whatsapp Video tours now available, ask your agent for further details on   Up to 20% of Residential Realtors viewings since January 2019 were carried out remotely. Address: UNCLE Colindale, Aeriel Square, London, NW9
Description: UNCLE Colindale - a stunningly designed development nestled in a bustling and vibrant community in North-West London. Its spacious and quiet apartments come with designer furniture and top spec appliances, plus amazing amenity spaces including a gym designed - in collaboration with some of London's leading personal trainers and dedicated coworking space. And if all that isn't enough, it's only 22 minutes from your front door to King's Cross. Pretty great, right? UNCLE Colindale is now open and accepting move ins from December 2022. This is the newest UNCLE building and is designed with stylish interior, furnished by BoConcept or if it's your preference, we also have unfurnished apartments. We have on-site resident managers & spacious amenity spaces with our gym and wellness space opening in the summer of 2023. As well as its amazing studio apartments, UNCLE Colindale has friendly and helpful on-site Resident Managers that live on the property. They are there to help ensure your home is the amazing place it should be - including sorting any maintenance and looking after your parcel deliveries. If the ideal travel links weren't enough, there's some beautiful scenery right on your doorstep. You're a short walk from the Silk Stream which flows through some of the most iconic parts of North-West London. There's even walking tours available that elevate the walk from a joyous jaunt to a fascinating and educational adventure about your new neighbourhood. And not far away either is the equally wonderful Montrose Park. With everything from a locally loved café (seriously, read the reviews if you don't believe us), to a skatepark and playing fields hosting bootcamps and yoga classes. In addition to this there is the Bang Bang oriental food hall within walking distance to curb your appetite. In a nutshell, you're looking at beautiful apartments with designer furniture in Zone 4 with amazing access to central London and a gym, Peloton studio, coworking space, plus wonderful on-site Resident Managers and the amazing UNCLE community. And at a great price. What's not to love? UNCLE is renting as it should be. What does that mean for you? That means on-site resident managers that know your name, look after your packages if you're out and help you get settled in. It means never having to worry about that leaky tap. It means coming home to relax on your luxurious BoConcept sofa before heading to the Peloton studio for a workout. It means, as a renter, finally being treated with the respect you deserve. As we like to say, there's no place like UNCLE - and we mean it. Although The City is within walking distance the area is well connected with excellent transport links via London Bridge & Tower Hill stations as-well as the river taxi. Short-Let: A fully refurbished one bedroom flat finished to a high standard in the heart of Fulham. A recently refurbished one double bedroom flat on the second floor of a period building.  This contemporary flat comprises an open plan kitchen with a spacious reception room, a large double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a modern bathroom. The property is decorated to a high spec and is offered furnished. With this property, there is access to a communal storage room on the ground floor. The living room offers an incredible view of St John's church.  The property is a couple of minutes away from Fulham Broadway, which is an extremely convenient place to live with plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants close to hand (including a large Waitrose, a Wholefoods Market, and the Fulham Farmers' market).  The closest underground station is Fulham Broadway (District Line, Zone 2), however transport links at Earls Court, Parsons Green and West Brompton are also within walking distance.  You can catch regular buses from Fulham Broadway that head towards Chelsea, central London and the city. Brochures 376 North End Road, London Brochure Read more

We are delighted to offer to the market a modern two bedroom two bathroom Apartment located in Limehouse, E1, for easy access into the City and Canary Wharf. The accommodation comprises of an entrance hallway, kitchen, living room with door opening on to a private balcony, double bedrooms and two bathrooms. Benefits include underfloor heating, integrated appliances including fridge/freezer, dishwasher, oven and electric hob with extractor above, washing machine, fitted wardrobe in bedroom as well as plenty of additional storage space. Each resident will have free access to the onsite gym and yoga room, communal gardens and secure bicycle stores. Being situated in a fantastic part of London the development has been pre-wired to support super-fast broadband as well as Sky. There are also 2 lifts servicing the building and 24 hour security.
   In addition to being stylishly furnished, there is also a luxurious home office package to allow you to work comfortably from home when necessary. The office package includes a smart motor assisted sit-stand desk, an ergonomic office chair and a book case. 
   Beagle Court is ideally located on Solomon Way, E1 and is ideally located close to transport links including Limehouse DLR (0.4mi), Stepney Green Underground (0.5 mi) offering both District and Hammersmith and City lines all providing frequent services into Canary Wharf (9 mins), Liverpool Street (14 mins), Bank (15 mins) and London Bridge (17 mins). Local amenities include Mile End Park and leisure centre (0.5 mi), cinema, Husk coffee. For the cyclists there is Victoria Park (2.1 mi), Canary Wharf (1.4 mi), London Fields (2.7 mi), Bank (2.6 mi) and Old Street (2.9 mi).  
   Please note, Ropemakers development is part of a Car Free Zone meaning there is no parking available on the site and a permit cannot be obtained from the local Council for local streets.

Welcome to this exceptional two-bedroom flat, presented in excellent condition and boasts a stylish interior with luxury furnishings. Situated on the ground floor of an impressive portered block, this property offers ample living space and a range of desirable features. Step into the stunning reception room, elegantly designed with a dedicated dining area, providing a perfect space for entertaining and relaxation. The contemporary open-plan kitchen is thoughtfully integrated, boasting modern appliances and sleek finishes, making it a delight for any home chef. CBRE are delighted to present this stunning two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, situated in one of London’s most anticipated BtR developments, Riverstone Heights.  Brought to you by Way of Life, award winners of The Pineapple Award’s Activation and Community Life 2023 category. Known for their community building, Way of Life are frontrunners of built-for-renters with their stand-out placemaking, resident events and first-class amenity offerings. This one-bedroom apartment boasts over 545SqFt of internal living space. Inside the apartment, you'll find a stylish bespoke interior with integrated appliances, stone worktops, tiled bathroom, and a contemporary kitchen, all carefully selected to create a home with a luxurious finish. The open-plan reception area features exquisite wood flooring, leading out onto a private balcony with panoramic views across London.  Residents will further enjoy several benefits whilst residing in Riverstone Heights.  Alongside these stunning apartments, the buildings first floor is dedicated to co-working spaces, private meeting rooms, phone booths and a kitchenette. Residents will also enjoy unrivalled views across the City from the 27th floor private roof terrace, including outside heated seating areas, canopies & residents BBQ’s. Situated just off the terrace is also a large indoor communal lounge, complete with a private dining area available for exclusive hire, perfect for that special occasion.  Bromley-by-Bow tube station, situated in Zone 2, is served by the Hammersmith & City and District lines. You can be in the City within 10 minutes and Oxford Circus in under 20 minutes. You can also enjoy quick connections to the jubilee line via West Ham (one stop), or the Central line via Mile end (two stops).  Bromley-by-Bow is hemmed in by some of London's most exciting shopping destinations - from the unique boutique stores of Shoreditch to major scale retail at Stratford Westfield and Canary Wharf and the unique vintage stores of Roman Road, Roman Road Market and Victoria Park Village. Address: Uncle Stockwell, 60 Courland Grove, London, SW8
Description: New to the market after its UNCLE makeover, this spacious and stylish studio flat is situated in a highly sought-after development in Zone 2 of London overlooking Larkhall Park. UNCLE Stockwell is located within a 10-minute walk of Stockwell tube station on the Northern and Victoria lines, offering fantastic connections to Victoria, Euston and London Bridge and Wandsworth Road overground station for direct connections to Clapham, Canada Water and Denmark Hill for Kings College Hospital.    At UNCLE, we never expect our residents to settle for second best, so our revitalised studios now come with brand new Bo Concept furniture, newly installed top spec kitchen appliances, updated ensuite bathrooms with new showers, and great storage solutions to help you maximise space.  As well as its amazing studio apartments, UNCLE Stockwell has friendly and helpful on-site Resident Managers that live on the property. They are there to help ensure your home is the amazing place it should be - including sorting any maintenance and looking after your parcel deliveries.  All residents have access to the free on-site Peloton studio, gym (which has also been expanded as part of the makeover), coworking space with private work pods, resident's lounge and communal courtyard.  In a nutshell, you're looking at a beautiful, revamped studio apartment with designer furniture in Zone 2 with amazing access to central London and a gym, Peloton studio, coworking space, plus wonderful on-site Resident Managers and the amazing UNCLE community. And at a great price. What's not to love?  A great location as part of the triangle with Brixton and Vauxhall known as 'Little Portugal', which is the hub for amazing Portuguese restaurants, cafes and bakeries that London has to offer.  A thriving local community providing a wide selection of local shops, restaurants and local amenities with the buzz of Brixton and Clapham's boutiques, shops, bars, restaurants and amazing parks (including Clapham Common and Battersea Park) within walking distance. Not only this, but you're only a short walk from the Thames, and from the Victoria and Northern lines, as well as the overground, so getting into Central London is a cinch. Read more

Address: UNCLE Colindale, Aerial Square, London, NW9
Description: UNCLE Colindale - a stunningly designed development nestled in a bustling and vibrant community in North-West London. Its spacious and quiet apartments come with designer furniture and top spec appliances, plus amazing amenity spaces including a gym designed - in collaboration with some of London's leading personal trainers and dedicated coworking space. And if all that isn't enough, it's only 22 minutes from your front door to King's Cross. Pretty great, right? UNCLE Colindale is now open and accepting move ins from December 2022. This is the newest UNCLE building and is designed with stylish interior, furnished by BoConcept or if it's your preference, we also have unfurnished apartments. We have on-site resident managers & spacious amenity spaces with our gym and wellness space opening in the summer of 2023. As well as its amazing studio apartments, UNCLE Colindale has friendly and helpful on-site Resident Managers that live on the property. They are there to help ensure your home is the amazing place it should be - including sorting any maintenance and looking after your parcel deliveries. If the ideal travel links weren't enough, there's some beautiful scenery right on your doorstep. You're a short walk from the Silk Stream which flows through some of the most iconic parts of North-West London. There's even walking tours available that elevate the walk from a joyous jaunt to a fascinating and educational adventure about your new neighbourhood. And not far away either is the equally wonderful Montrose Park. With everything from a locally loved café (seriously, read the reviews if you don't believe us), to a skatepark and playing fields hosting bootcamps and yoga classes. In addition to this there is the Bang Bang oriental food hall within walking distance to curb your appetite. In a nutshell, you're looking at beautiful apartments with designer furniture in Zone 4 with amazing access to central London and a gym, Peloton studio, coworking space, plus wonderful on-site Resident Managers and the amazing UNCLE community. And at a great price. What's not to love? UNCLE is renting as it should be. What does that mean for you? That means on-site resident managers that know your name, look after your packages if you're out and help you get settled in. It means never having to worry about that leaky tap. It means coming home to relax on your luxurious BoConcept sofa before heading to the Peloton studio for a workout. It means, as a renter, finally being treated with the respect you deserve. As we like to say, there's no place like UNCLE - and we mean it. That moment when you have your heart set on your dream property only to be told it has been let! London rental market is not just one of the most competitive markets in the world but fastmoving, with multiple tenants in a race to get the top properties. On many occasions up to 15 applicants for a single open house viewing. Here at Residential Realtors we have listened to your feedback and are proud to be the first London agent to offer the opportunity to make a Pre Viewing Reservation (PVR) What is a Pre Viewing Reservation (PVR)? If all tenants are unable to view the property immediately. Reserve the property before your scheduled viewing time, by placing a PVR offer you will have the comfort of knowing that the property is reserved for you until your scheduled viewing slot. How can a make a PVR offer? 1. Complete our Previewing Reservation Form (Esign Application available on request) 2. Pay a one weeks rent holding deposit. 3. Arrange the appointment to view the property or organise a Facetime, Skype or Whatsapp Video Tour. 4. If the property does not live up to your expectation after your viewing, a refund will be issued within 24 hours of your request. 5. If you decide to proceed with a formal offer, the £500.00 will be used towards the initial payment of your first months rent. Struggling to find time to go on rental viewings? Facetime, Skype or Whatsapp Video tours now available, ask your agent for further details on    Up to 20% of Residential Realtors viewings since January 2019 were carried out remotely.  Majority of customers signed on the dotted line without ever seeing the homes in person.  Overseas customers, graduates and young professionals as well as timepoor Londoners are leading the way. Fountain House in opulent Mayfair is a luxury building that towers at nine floors high, and is home to some of the area's most luxurious apartments.
   This stunning block is not only directly opposite London's most famous park, Hyde Park, but also overlooks London's most famous street. Park Lane. This incredible two bedroom, two bathroom apartment is newly decorated and fully furnished. Featuring wooden style flooring throughout, the apartment is generous in space, largely open-planned with large windows ensuring that it's filled with lots of natural daylight.
   As well as an onsite concierge service and building management team, the apartments location is extremely well connected to London's bustling transport network. Not only will you find bus stops all along Park Lane, you'll also find Hyde Park Corner Underground Station (Piccadilly Line) less than a ten minute walk away and Marble Arch Underground Station (Central Line) - less than a five minute bus journey away.
   Please note, apartment furnishings may slightly differ to what is shown in the photos. Images shown are a guide only. Contact us to arrange a viewing today. Read more

Address: Sandringham Court, 99 Maida Vale, Maida Vale, London, W9
Description: A contemporary four bedroom lateral apartment to rent in a desirable mansion block in Maida Vale. The property boasts an on-site gym, private balcony and communal gardens.   Description A beautifully presented four double bedroom lateral apartment positioned on the 1st floor (with lift) of this sought after mansion block in Maida Vale. The property offers in excess of 1690 sq ft of living and entertainment space and includes a porter, on-site gym (fees apply to sign up) and communal gardens. The accommodation comprises four bedrooms, three bathrooms with underfloor heating (2 x en suite), fully integrated kitchen with modern Neff appliances and a double reception room which leads onto a private Juliet balcony. Location Maida Vale is a stunning location in west London, offering period conversions and red-brick mansion flats some of which include well-manicured communal gardens.  Paddington Recreational Ground offers open green space for the avid jogger and dog walker, as well as an athletics track, gym and 3D artificial pitch.  In addition, there are a number of tennis clubs in the immediate area.   BBC Maida Vale Studios is conveniently located on a quiet residential street and hosts a number of live performances.   The local area has excellent transport links from Maida Vale Station (Bakerloo Line) and great bus links into central London.  Maida Vale benefits from a wide selection of local amenities such as cafes, bars, restaurants and florists accessible via Elgin Avenue and Lauderdale Parade. Square Footage: 1,663 sq ft   Brochures Web Details Read more

A luxurious studio in the prestigious and much anticipated One Park Drive located in Wood Wharf, Canary Wharf. Intricately designed by award-winning architects Herzog & De Meuron, One Park Drive represents the highest standard of residential living. With a beautiful rotating facade that stretches 58-storeys into the sky, the tower has three distinct zones which maximise the light flooding into the living space. The apartment includes built-in wardrobes and storage, underfloor-heating, comfort cooling, a fully equipped kitchen with the latest appliances and a private balcony.  Residents at the development will have access to first class facilities including the reception, twenty-four-hour concierge, lounge, library and cinema, all of which are on the ground floor. The first floor houses the exclusive health club including a 20-metre pool, gym, studio space and spa.  One Park Drive is ideally located and is close to both Canary Wharf and excellent transport links to The City. Read more

Address: The Madison, Marsh Wall, Canary Wharf, E14
Description: *Available September* Luxury 21st floor 889 sq.ft two bed apartment offering Canary Wharf, O2, and the river Thames views! The Madison is conveniently located minutes from Canary Wharf. One of the capital’s newest and most exciting living and working environments. The location is ideal, Canary Wharf is easily accessible by rail, road, and river and underground. With Jubilee Line links straight to the West End, and Docklands Light Railway providing direct access to the City, Canary Wharf remains one of the most connected areas of London.  The new Crossrail link, due to open in 2018 will further improve transport connections across the city. All of London’s five airports are within easy reach, making international travel easy and straightforward. The Madison raises sophisticated city living to new heights of excellence. Soaring 53 storeys high and standing 182m tall, it offers unparalleled views of one of London's most dynamic areas. With 2.6 metre floor-to-ceiling heights and generous internal space, the design and layout of these superb apartments has been meticulously planned to ensure maximum daylight while taking advantage of the panoramic views. The designers, MAKE architects, have a simple purpose: to design the best buildings, places and spaces in the world. Through this framework The Madison will epitomise exactly this, with its optimal architecture and intricate specifications. The Madison’s bespoke-designed fitted kitchens, Siemens integrated appliances and full height feature windows are just some of the highly intricate fittings making these living spaces so desirable.  AMENITIES Business lounge, 24 hour Concierge, Residents’ gymnasium, Swimming pool and Private screening room These particulars are not intended to form part of any contract. Photographs may be general images of the development and not be the actual apartment for sale. Read more

Description: It is rare for a Penthouse apartment to come to the market in this well run portered building with parking.   This fabulous sixth floor apartment has been totally refurbished throughout and has magnificent far reaching views across London.   The spacious reception room leads onto a terrace which faces west getting the evening sun.  All the bedrooms are a very good size with brand new bathrooms and excellent storage.  The kitchen is well designed and is adjoined by a utility room.   Decorated throughout in neutral colours, this very special apartment would make a wonderful family flat as well being excellent for entertaining.  Full length curtains are to be installed throughout the flat.  There is 24 hour porterage and a parking space for one car within the building.     Read more

Description:
Experience 37 floors of spectacular luxury living in the heart of Stratford, East London's most exciting neighbourhood. Our two-bedroom rental apartments boast unparalleled panoramic views of the city's skyline, paying tribute to Stratford's rich railway history with exceptional amenities and green open spaces.  
   Coppermaker Square offers residents' panoramic views of the city from its high floors. Our stylish interiors come with furnishing options from Bo-Concept, offering you a premium rental experience with a range of colour palettes to suit your style.  
   Relax in the comfort of your spacious two-bedroom apartment with high ceilings and phenomenal views of London's highlights from the 37th floor. Our large private lobby space and direct access to Westfield Avenue provide unmatched convenience, making our apartments the perfect place to call home.  
   This exceptional two-bedroom apartment includes a main bedroom with an en suite, quality built-in wardrobes in both bedrooms, a spacious bathroom, a Juliet balcony, under-floor heating and an air-cooling system.

This beautifully presented and fully re-furbished 2 bedroom apartment, with double-aspect views, is situated on the 4th floor of this popular and well-run art deco building on Sloane Avenue. Internally, it boasts a well-appointed kitchen with a Bosch Washer Dryer and Siemens Fridge/ Freezer, 4 ring Electric Hob & Oven and a built-in microwave. Additionally, there is a Villeroy & Boch bathroom (with shower), wooden floors throughout and good wardrobe storage (hanging and shelf storage) in each bedroom.  Residents of Nell Gwynn House benefit from a 24 hour concierge service and the building is in close proximity to the high-end boutiques, shops and restaurants of Sloane Square, South Kensington and Kings Road. There is a wealth of local transport facilities including Sloane Square underground station (District and Circle lines) and South Kensington underground station (District/Circle/Piccadilly lines). Local attractions include the Natural History Museum, Science Museum, Harrods, Harvey Nichols and the V&A. Please note the in-house cost of Hot Water & Heating will be paid for by the tenant. Available August  this bright 12th floor Two Bedroom South West Facing apartment in the much anticipated Eagle Development on City Road.  The property is 936 square foot (87 sq. m) allowing ample space for City Living. The property comprises of two good sized double bedrooms, the master benefiting from an ensuite shower room, a large open plan kitchen reception room, a modern family bathroom again with a large double shower and storage. The property benefits from a large terrace with fantastic views of the City and West End .   The interior has been completed by an interior design team and includes herringbone wooden flooring, Natuzzi, BoConcept and Heals furniture, a bespoke walnut media unit, pocket sprung Dreams beds and colour coordinated black out blinds and all mod cons. The walls have been finished with a Farrow & Ball elephant breath paint scheme and with Osbourne & Little wallpaper. Other additions include a wall mounted plasma tv and a sky box with built in Freeview channels. This truly is a wonderful ready to move in easy apartment.    The Eagle development itself benefits from a 24 hour concierge, a residents gym including spa area and a cinema room. It is located on City Road within a stone’s throw of Old Street station benefiting from both northern line and overground, easy access to the City, Shoreditch and Liverpool Street. Read more

Location This two-bedroom apartment is situated in the idyllic area of Islington. Property Description The living room is equipped with a comfortable sofa, two armchairs, a coffee table, a dining table and a Smart TV. There’s also a desk and ergonomic chair for those days when you work from home. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances and includes all the cooking utensils you could need to prepare a quick snack or your evening dinner. The bedrooms are equipped with king-size beds, full-length mirrors and plenty of storage cupboards, and the bathroom comes with a bathtub. The balcony offers a cosy table and seating for two. Neighbourhood Situated less than 200 metres from Essex Road Station and serviced by six bus lines, the property allows easy and quick access to key locations for commuters and tourists alike. Major business districts such as The City of London, Canary Wharf, Holborn, King’s Cross, Camden and the West End are all easily accessible from this location, as are the universities in and around Euston. You can also explore famous London streets and landmarks such as St. Paul’s Cathedral, Oxford Street, Regent’s Park and Soho, making your trip one to remember. Angel station and Highbury & Islington station are a short bus ride away, connecting you to London’s famous tube network and overground trains. From this location, you can easily access Luton Airport too. The neighbourhood offers a wealth of communal green spaces, with Rosemary Gardens, Shoreditch Park, Islington Green and Highbury Park within easy distance. And the Regent’s Canal walking and cycling path is only an 8-minute stroll from the flat. The area surrounding your property is full of cafes, restaurants, shops, and supermarkets, making it easy to enjoy coffee, lunch, and dinner out within the vibrant area. With our years of experience in London, we recommend visiting Akari, Tierra Peru, Ottolenghi, Terra Rosa, Gallipoli and La Farola. Coffee shops and cafes in the area include Hungry Bikes, Cooks & Books, Brood Roastery, Costa Coffee and Devotion Coffee. If you would like to experience a British tradition, try one of our London pubs, our favourites being No Such Place, Green Man, The Alpaca, Smokehouse and Myddleton Arms, all less than 5-7 minutes’ walk from the property. You'll find all the essentials, from pans to cutlery, a kettle to a toaster, plates to chopping boards, and tea towels to bathroom towels. Bed linens are also provided, making it easy for you to settle in right away. The apartment is fully furnished, so you don't have to worry about bringing anything. Whether you're in London for business or need a temporary home while you search for something more permanent, this apartment is suitable for anyone seeking a comfortable and convenient living space. With all bills included, you can focus on enjoying your stay without any additional hassle. Situated in the heart of Hackney, this property puts you right in the middle of everything you'll need. London Fields, Broadway Market, and various bars are just a short walk away, offering endless entertainment and dining options. Suppose you're in the mood for some outdoor relaxation. In that case, the great-sized balcony provides the perfect spot to soak up the atmosphere and observe the world passing by below. Rest assured; your security is a top priority in this property. Fob entry at the ground level and on the fourth floor ensures that only authorized individuals have access. Also, the building has secure bike storage, allowing you to store your bikes conveniently. The friendly neighbours add to the sense of community, making you feel at home. When it comes to location, you couldn't ask for more. London Fields Park, the Overground, and Broadway Market are all just a 6-minute walk away. If you head in the other direction, you'll reach Victoria Park in 7 minutes. The excellent transport links in the area make it easy to explore the rest of London and beyond. There is on-street visitor parking at an additional cost which I can secure for you for up to 40 days. This exceptional property will be available for you to move in from the 1st of August, with a minimum stay of 1 month. Take advantage of this fantastic opportunity - contact OpenRent today for more details or to arrange a viewing! Located on the banks of the river Thames, moments from Oval Square and a short hop to the 02 with its vast array of shops, bars and entertainment, this luxury 3-bedroom apartment benefits from it's own front door and ground floor access, it has been tastefully furnished throughout with each room benefits from a double bed with storage. Super convenient for the tube or river taxi and further benefits from a 24-hour concierge to help you manage your keys and parcels. In making a home special for you we curated a home to be comfortable, safe, familiar and a sanctuary which makes each room we rent a retreat, a place to escape and relax from fast-paced city life. We achieved this by looking to the defining characteristic of Danish culture, “hygge” [Pronounced Hoo-gah]. A quality of cosiness and comfortable conviviality that engenders a feeling of contentment or well-being and applied it to our homes. So, we refined our spaces to be full of comfort, convenience and familiarity which gives our members everything they need to make where they choose to live, home. Offered furnished and available from 27th October 2023. Read more
