SHORT LET 12th August 2023 - 9th October 2023 HOUSE SHARE - Located on the banks of the river Thames, moments from Oval Square and a short hop to the 02 with its vast array of shops, bars and entertainment, is this luxury house share. Super convenient for the tube or river taxi and further benefits from a 24-hour concierge to help you manage your keys and parcels. In making a home special for you we curated a home to be comfortable, safe, familiar and a sanctuary which makes each apartment we rent a retreat, a place to escape and relax from fast-paced city life. We achieved this by looking to the defining characteristic of Danish culture, “hygge” [Pronounced Hoo-gah]. A quality of cosiness and comfortable conviviality that engenders a feeling of contentment or well-being and applied it to our homes. So, we refined our spaces to be full of comfort, convenience and familiarity which gives our members everything they need to make where they choose to live, home. WHATS INCLUDED? Address: Pearl House, 5 Market Road, Islington, N7
Description: *Available August* | Offered Unfurnished  Oversized one bedroom apartment offering a dual south and east aspect located in London Square's boutique and highly sought-after Pearl House, Caledonian Road, N7  Located on the 1st floor and spread over an impressive 646 Sq.Ft this apartment offers renters the rare chance to live in one of the largest one bedroom apartments in the development whilst also benefitting from a vast amount of light and air due mainly to its corner positioning and the southerly aspect.  The apartment is finished to the highest standard, with gorgeous herringbone flooring fitted in the living room, kitchen and hallways this is elevated further with zoned under-floor heating throughout. The living is unquestionably the heart of this apartment offering excellent proportions in both the kitchen and living area and seamlessly flow to the oversized south facing balcony with views towards some of the landscaped gardens.  The kitchen comes fully equipped with Siemens appliances to fit all the needs of modern living. As standard the apartment comes with an induction hob, dishwasher, microwave oven, single fan oven and fridge/freezer. There is also plenty of built in storage that maximises the entire length of the back wall. As you leave the living room you find access the bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom comes with a bespoke composite vanity mirror, of which is backlit with halo styled lighting and fitted on to a large cabinet, chrome heated towel rail, circular-fixed showerhead and underfloor heated tiling.  The bedroom comes with fitted luxury carpet as well as a bespoke built in wardrobe. Like the living room the bedroom has access to its own private south facing balcony. As a resident of Pearl House you have access to a 24-Hour concierge, residents gym and landscaped podium gardens. Pearl House is ideally positioned from both Caledonian Road Underground Station & Caledonian Road & Barnsbury Overground Station. Read more

Detailed Description The Forge is not simply a place to lay your head down, but the community you are looking for in East London. A collection of light and modern 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments and 4 bedroom town houses. The large open plan living space is perfect for entertaining and the kitchen is fitted with integrated Smeg appliances including a dishwasher. All fitted with Fibre BT & Virgin Media connections and available furnished or unfurnished.
 Furry friend you'd like to keep by your side? Not a problem, we are completely pet friendly and your animal friend will only cost you an additional £30 rent per month.
 *Please contact a member of our team for our pet policy.
   Amenities
 Living at The Forge means more than a new home, we take community seriously. Our residents benefit from exclusive access to all onsite amenities including a beautiful landscaped roof terrace, fully fitted gym with state of the art equipment and the Residents' lounge including a flexible work space and full sized pool table. The friendly onsite staff are available 24/7 to assist with any queries or issues and throw exclusive resident events throughout the year. Making your neighbour more than someone to water the plants while you're away.
 Tenancy Subject to contract and satisfactory references, the apartment is to be let on an assured shorthold tenancy with flexible terms but subject to a minimum term of 12 months.
       The landlord positively encourages longer term tenancies.
   The tenant is responsible for the payment of outgoings including council tax, electricity, heating, water & telephone / broadband.
   A returnable deposit equivalent to 5 weeks rent will be required prior to the commencement of the tenancy. This sum will be returned at the end of the term less any amount for dilapidations or breaches of the terms of the tenancy agreement. The deposit will be held in the TDS deposit scheme
 Location Located in Zone 3, just 5 minutes' walk from Upton Park, The Forge has great connections to the City and Central London. Serviced by both the District Line and Hammersmith and City Line, Canary Wharf, Stratford and London Bridge are all accessible in under 20 minutes and Kings Cross in 25 minutes.

SHORT LET 12th August 2023 - 9th October 2023 HOUSE SHARE Located on the banks of the river Thames, moments from Oval Square and a short hop to the 02 with its vast array of shops, bars and entertainment, this luxury 3-bedroom apartment offers views across Swan Lake and the green open spaces of peninsula park. Super convenient for the tube or river taxi and further benefits from a 24-hour concierge to help you manage your keys and parcels. Parking is available to rent on a month to month basis at an extra cost. In making a home special for you we curated a home to be comfortable, safe, familiar and a sanctuary which makes each room we rent a retreat, a place to escape and relax from fast-paced city life. We achieved this by looking to the defining characteristic of Danish culture, “hygge” [Pronounced Hoo-gah]. A quality of cosiness and comfortable conviviality that engenders a feeling of contentment or well-being and applied it to our homes. So, we refined our spaces to be full of comfort, convenience and familiarity which gives our members everything they need to make where they choose to live, home. You will also get to live with awesome people like you that are like minded, socially responsible, share similar values and interests who also call London their home. We’re more than just a place to live, we’re a growing community and you can get involved with any of our planned happenings and experiences or not if you wish, but we do encourage our members to look out for one and other and build relationships that endure. Available from the 18th of September  At 75 Floors, Landmark Pinnacle will boast the highest homes in Europe and will be the tallest residential tower in Western Europe. Located at the western end of South West India Dock, the tower is directly adjacent to The Landmark – a residential collection of four buildings rising to 44 storeys and set around a landscaped podium completed by Chalegrove in 2010. Unified by their architecture, The Landmark Pinnacle and Landmark are connected by waterfront pedestrian routes that also extend established public spaces to promote animation at the waterside. This includes a cafe painting and a new sloping rooftop garden. Behind the stainless-steel and double-glazed glass facade lies one of the largest resident's amenity spaces in London. Spread across five floors, with three of these floors fully dedicated to amenities: residents can enjoy a cinema, lounges, gymnasium, dining rooms, children’s play areas, landscaped gardens and to top it off two double height roof terraces crown the building, acting as an illuminated marker at night. Features Microwave Full Double Glazing  Oven/Hob Read more

Address: Legacy Building, Embassy Gardens, Nine Elms, London, SW11
Description: Large studio apartment in the premium specification Legacy Building is a spacious offering with elegant design and finishes throughout. This property boasts of modern systems and features for comfortable living within the stylish and sought-after Embassy Gardens.  Ample built in storage allows you to make best use of the space available within the open plan lounge and bedroom area, which is partially separated by a bespoke glass panel partition. The large private balcony is accessible from the lounge through modern sliding doors which brighten this seventh floor home with an abundance of natural light.  Inspired by the architecture of trendy meat packing district in New York City, Embassy Gardens embodies award winning building designs with a tranquil and village-like atmosphere with its thoughtfully designed leafy outside spaces and assortment of cafes, restaurants, and local businesses. This neighbourhood is a perfect example of modern place making and is a firm favourite for those looking for new homes in an established destination. World class facilities are quite literally the headline in Embassy Gardens, with offerings such at the iconic floating Sky Pool drawing attention globally. But to the locals, this is nothing other than home - and the onsite cinema, gyms, spa, pools, and workspaces are just an extension of this and are integrated in the day-to-day lifestyle for those who live here.  Situated a short walk from Vauxhall station, Victoria Line and National Rail Zones, and the newly opened Northern Line extension - this riverside location is idyllic for commuters and those who like to stay connected! Read more

Felicity J Lord are pleased to bring to market, this generous two double bedroom two bathroom apartment located on the top floor (accessed via lift) of the highly desirable Towerside building, a sought after private development on the banks of the river Thames.  The main reception room allows for entertaining as a well as a separate study area, ideal for use as a home office. Three balconies overlooking the river floods the room with natural light and allowing the outside in. the tiled family bathroom boasts a three piece suite. Finished to a good standard, the apartment has high quality fixtures and fittings including; bespoke cabinetry and fitted wardrobes. The dine-in kitchen boasts metro tiling. Other features include: Double glazed windows with additional secondary glazing, secure video entry system, porter & parking space. Wapping station (London Overground) is just a few hundred yards to the west with Tower Hill (District and Circle lines) and Tower Gateway (DLR) stations both within walking distance. This property is available with a Deposit Free option which means that instead of paying a traditional five weeks security deposit, you pay a fee of one weeks rent + VAT to become a member of a deposit free renting scheme which significantly reduces the up-front costs. This fee is non-refundable and is not a deposit so cannot be used towards covering the cost of any future damage. Brochures Particulars Read more

Description: A well proportioned and beautifully presented groundfloor two-bedroom Victorian terrace flat with outlook on to a Garden Square with children-s playground. The flat comprises a large living room, 2 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a large modern bathroom with shower and separate bath, and an eat-in kitchen with in-built white goods and outlook on to the garden courtyard. There is also a large, tanked, cellar for convenient storage. Parking outside is permit-holders and easy to come by. The flat is located on a beautiful square within the welcoming local Holmewood Neighbourhood Association community. It is a short walk to a continuous flow of numerous buses taking you to Brixton and Streatham Hill with ease. Brixton station is also within easy walking distance. There is a Sainsburys local at the end of the street and the flat is also within catchment of excellent Primary Schools rated Outstanding. Property Reference: 1761074. A rare opportunity to live well and entertain with panache in this iconic, luxury 2 floor maisonette which is visibly stunning on both the inside and outside. Tucked away from any main road but only minutes walking distance from Euston Station, this spacious, two-bedroom, two-bathroom, fully furnished property has been completely renovated and features high-quality fittings, furniture and high-tech equipment.  Following its conversion from former pub to luxury living accommodation, the entire building now comprises 2 maisonettes (inc this one) and 3 flats on the upper floors.  This maisonette has its own direct access to street level and benefits from a video intercom system and CCTV. The front door leads into a bright sun drenched stunning L shaped living space furnished with luxurious sofas, a concrete dining table and a fully integrated kitchen with Siemens appliances (fridge/freezer, gas hob, electric oven and dishwasher). As this area formed part of the former pub, its exceptionally high ceilings (now fitted with Q Acoustic speakers) make this space feel light and airy. Double glazed hardwood windows have been fitted with electric blinds to provide additional privacy.  The property has been fitted with engineered wood floor and underfloor heating throughout. A wood and glass LED-lit staircase takes you down to the lower level where the former lightwells of the pub have been converted into private courtyards which bring in plenty of natural light to the bedrooms. A purpose built cupboard in the hallway houses a Siemens washer/dryer. The main bedroom is furnished with a King-size bed and a luxurious 1200-sprung mattress. To compliment the space there is a solid oak wardrobe, chest of drawers and 2 bedside cabinets. Two doors provide access to the courtyards located at the front and side of the building and have been fitted with electric, bluetooth operated blackout blinds which you can set to wake you up via your phone. In the corner of the main bedroom is a spacious en-suite with walk-in rain shower, sink, wall-mounted WC and heated towel rail. It benefits from underfloor heating and mood lighting. The second bedroom is furnished with a copper-framed double bed, 1200 sprung mattress, chest of drawers and bedside table with its own direct access to one of the outside courtyards also fitted with the same electric blackout blinds. A full height walk-in wardrobe offers plenty of hanging space and shelf space.  As the master bedroom has its own en suite, the second bedroom has sole use of the main bathroom which has been fitted with a bath / shower over bath, wall mounted WC and electric towel rail.  This maisonette is located 6 minutes walk from Euston station, 2 minutes from Mornington Crescent and 10 minutes to Camden so has amazing central connections whilst benefiting from being set back from the hustle and bustle of the Euston Road and Eversholt Street in a quiet neighbourhood. Address: Shepton Houses, Welwyn Street, Bethnal Green, E2
Description: £800 PER WEEK - SHORT LET/HOLIDAY LET A quirky fully furnished two double-bedroom apartment located minutes to Bethnal Green Underground Station. A quirky fully furnished two double-bedroom apartment located minutes to Bethnal Green Underground Station and set within a Victorian mansion block is a Short let/ Holiday let which is £800 Per week. This property comes with a Fitted fully appliance kitchen, modern bathroom with walk-in shower, everything you should need for a enjoyable stay. Within Shepton house there is a communal garden which is very well kept by the current tenants living within the buildings, it also which attracts plenty of sunlight and a nice quite area to relax. Shepton House was built by the East End Dwelling Company towards the end of the nineteenth century, to house the poor. It's a bit fancier these days and houses an eclectic mix of the community. Getting around is easy. Bethnal Green tube is a 5 minutes walk which will take you into the West End in 15 minutes or East towards Stratford and the Olympic Park. The Westfield shopping centre is a full day of shopping, so if you’re going there – be prepared! There's a huge cinema there and also some nice eateries.    Victoria Park is a must see spanning over 200 acres of historic beauty. On Sunday it hosts the food market (Bonner Gate entrance) where there are literally 100’s of street food wagons and fancy independent food sellers. From there you could walk to Columbia Road Flower market (don’t miss) and then onto Spitalfields Market, through Brick Lane. (world famous beigel bakery is here) Spitalfields / Shoreditch is a creative neighbourhood with a vibrant nightlife and is home to many of London’s best clubs, independent shops and businesses. Broadway Market is a Victorian street market situated in Hackney, Just a short walk away. In addition to the thriving Saturday market, there are over 70 shops, cafés and restaurants open seven days a week from dawn to dusk. From costermongers to green-grocers, everything that is fit to sell is on offer here. The street is part of the old “Porter’s Path” and has been in use since Roman Times and crosses over Regents canal, which also is a beautiful way to meander through London.  Contact us for more information and availability dates. Brochures Shepton Houses, Welwyn Street, Bethnal Green, E2 Read more

Property Reference: 1210290. Short Let. Situated on the river between Blackfriars and Millennium bridge, this exceptional 2 double bedroom flat with lift enjoys stunning views of St Paul's cathedral opposite and neighbouring Tate Modern's gardens to the south. It comes fully furnished and is ready to move into.   The entrance hall with generous storage cupboards opens onto a bright living room with modern open plan kitchen and oak wood floors throughout.  The kitchen features white stone worktops with breakfast bar and comes fully equipped with dishwasher, microwave and Nespresso machine.  The living room overlooks the river with a commanding view of St Paul's cathedral opposite. It is comfortably furnished with double corner sofa bed and Sony tv.  The two double bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and desks with the main bedroom overlooking the river and St Paul's and the second bedroom enjoying sunny, leafy views over Tate Gardens.  The bathroom includes bath with overhead shower and integrated washing machine.  Blackfriars railway station (Thameslink) is 5 minutes away and both Blackfriars (District and Circle lines) and Southwark tube station (Jubilee line) are within 10 minute's walk of the flat. A pleasant stroll over Millennium Bridge takes you to the City, St Paul's cathedral and shopping at New Change. There are several grocery stores within a five minute walk.  This attractive flat is very well located for both work and leisure. It is currently available on a short let basis although will consider long term rental.  Contact openrent.co.uk. Enjoy an array of period features throughout this beautiful two bedroom apartment, boasting  original wood flooring, fireplaces and cornicing throughout. Found just off popular Stroud Green Road, your inner North London sanctuary awaits - with access to an enviable private roof terrace. Discover high ceilings, recently refurbished wood flooring and large bay windows in the reception room at the front of the property, with plenty of room for lounge furniture. Next door you’ll find the newly-fitted kitchen boasting more wood flooring and neutral decor. Brand new double glazed windows throughout spills light across this property, while plentiful light grey cabinetry surrounds contemporary chrome appliances and clean splashback tiling. The two bedrooms reside towards the back of the abode, each hosting fresh cream walls, wooden flooring and multi-panelled windows. A cast iron radiator and original ornate fireplace adorn the primary bedroom, while inbuilt cupboards frame the second bedroom, perfect for a home office space. Next door you’ll find the attractive, tiled bathroom with full sized bath tub and overhead shower, and mirrored sink that sits next to the large sash window. The separate toilet resides adjacent, with extra wall mounted storage. Back into the hallway, access to the private roof terrace beckons - a secret oasis framed by mature trees offering a welcome getaway from the bustling city below.  Ideal for couples and young professionals alike, this two bedroom home is located in the leafy and vibrant neighbourhood of Stroud Green. Transport wise, you’ll find Crouch Hill Station awaits just 0.4 miles away and Finsbury Park Station a mere 0.8 miles away, both within walking distance. Description: An exciting opportunity to rent out a generously sized 2 bedroom apartment with built-in storage, in the heart of Battersea (London's NEW hotspot.) With easy access to multiple stations and the famous 200-acre Battersea Park.  This state-of-the-art apartment consists of two double bedrooms, two bathrooms with plenty of wardrobe space and under floor heating, an Italian designed bathroom with heated wall/ floor, plus a spacious open plan living/kitchen area with a generous private balcony. The apartment also benefits from Siemens appliances, plus a large storage cupboard, complete with hanging rail. Amenities include a 24 hour concierge, fully equipped spa including swimming pool, sauna / steam room, a large communal roof terrace plus attractively planted courtyard areas throughout the development.  Situated opposite Battersea Park, Prince of Wales of Drive is in a prime location close to central London and only minutes away from Chelsea /Nine Elms. It is also adjacent to the iconic Battersea Power Station.  Battersea Park is renowned for its timeless beauty, green open spaces and leisure activities ;  this  prestigious development combines this beauty with great design, befitting of its position and surroundings. The transport links are excellent, with overground and underground access within a five minute walk, with the new Northern Line extension at Battersea Power Station open NOW, which enable a commute time to the City in less than 15 minutes. Superbly presented family house with secluded garden and bike store.   Description The open plan double reception room provides both a formal seating area and children’s play area, the ideal diverse space for families. Particular highlights of this lovely room are the ornate gas fireplace and smart wooden floorboards, not to mention the solid bi-folding double doors which means flexibility in either separating off part of the reception room from the hallway as and when desired. The kitchen/dining room has been finished to an exceptional standard and enjoys access onto the garden beyond via full length glass bi-folding doors. The kitchen/dining room boasts underfloor heating, an array of modern appliances and a wine fridge. The first floor contains the majority of the accommodation with there being three good sized bedrooms which each contain bespoke built in storage. There is also a family bathroom on this floor which benefits from underfloor heating. The second floor has been converted into the guest suite which has access to a vast amount of eaves storage. There is also a cleverly built in home office area. The adjoining shower room is conveniently located off the corridor. The low maintenance garden has been meticulously and cleverly designed on a slight slope so that when watering the garden via the automatic watering irrigation system the water runs away from the house. A further focal point of the garden is the spot lighting throughout, which creates a secluded haven. Outside the front of the house is a bike store which has room to house four large bikes. Location Fielding Road is situated on the northern side of Bedford Park. It is within a 0.4 miles of Turnham Green Underground station (District line). There are numerous bus routes close by including the E3 and N11 towards Ealing and Liverpool Street. This location offers easy access to central London via the A4, and via the M4 for Heathrow Airport and the west of England. Description: At 75 floors, Landmark Pinnacle is London’s tallest residential towers with views that extend out across London’s unmistakable monuments and waterways.    Luxurious apartments lead off elegant carpeted lobbies and are beautifully presented in a neutral palette of white walls, timber floors and brushed chrome and black ironmongery.  The feel throughout is simple and sleek, with high-quality furnishings and fittings that complement, without detracting from, the spellbinding views across the water and landscape. A stand-out feature of many of the residences is a winter garden which can be accessed from the living area and bedroom. It provides space to sit and even comfortably dine outdoors, bringing in the light and views without the accompanying drop in temperature. As well as a private cinema, State-of-the-art amenities include a stunning 56th floor first class gym with a separate exercise studio and Pilates area. The 27th floor offers a magical childrens play area together with a more formal garden lounge for adults, lounge and library whilst the 75th floor is crowned by two roof terraces offering panoramic views across London.   Located at the western edge of Canary Wharf, excellent transport connections are available via Heron Quays DLR 0.3 mile, Canary Wharf London Underground 0.5 mile as well as the regular Thames Clippers river service 0.3 mile.
